SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PORTFOLIO P
JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)
M.MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')

SELECT F.THUMB_PATH , P.PORT_TITLE , M.MEMBER_NICKNAME , MIN_O.MIN_OPTION_PRICE , P.WRITE_DT , P.PORT_NO , P.PORT_CON , P.PORT_CONTACTDT , P.MEMBER_INFO , P.MEMBER_NO , F.FILE_NO , F.PORT_NO , F.FILE_NAME , F.FILE_PATH , F.FILE_TYPE , M.MEMBER_EMAIL , M.MEMBER_PASSWORD , M.MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_PHONE FROM PORTFOLIO P JOIN PORT_FILE F ON (F.PORT_NO = P.PORT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO) JOIN ( SELECT PORT_NO, MIN(OPTION_PRICE) AS MIN_OPTION_PRICE FROM PORT_OPTION O GROUP BY PORT_NO) MIN_O ON(MIN_O.PORT_NO = P.PORT_NO) WHERE F.FILE_TYPE = 'TITLE'
ORDER BY P.WRITE_DT DESC
ORDER BY P.WRITE_DT ASC
